c74object.name: fl.trace~
c74object.digest: Outputs audio frames (or values from the frame) to the host environment without overlapping, continuing the last value till a new frame arrives.
c74object.description: The mode parameter determines the value(s) that are output. This is intended for tracking control type values. The length of the internal buffer determines the maximum frame length. Output suffers no latency.

entry.name: 0. /mode [enum]
entry.description:
Sets the mode used for output: full - outputs the entire frame in full. first - output the first sample of the frame only. last - output the last sample of the frame only. specified - output the sample specified directly by the position parameter (clipped into the frame size). ratio - output the sample specified by the position parameter as a ratio to the frame length (clipped into the frame size).
[0] - full [1] - first [2] - last [3] - specified [4] - ratio

entry.name: 1. /buffer_size [instantiation double]
entry.description: Sets the internal buffer size in the units specified by the units parameter.

entry.name: 2. /units [instantiation enum]
entry.description:
Sets the time units used to determine the buffer size and delay.
[0] - samples [1] - ms [2] - seconds

entry.name: 3. /position [double]
entry.description: Sets the position of the output sample in specified mode (in samples) or ratio mode (as a ratio of the position in the frame).

entry.name: 4. /delay [double]
entry.description: Sets the delay before output in the units specified by the units parameter.
